 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְטִיפָה‎</span>?] **noun [feminine]** ==drop==, i.e. ==pendant, an ornament== (or ***pearl*** = Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, from likeness to drop of water; compare [[BDB#GFM|GFM]]);-only plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְטִיפוֺת‎</span> [[Judg.8.26|Judg 8:26]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְטִפוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.3.16|Isa 3:16]].
